definitions.title: n. f.
definitions.body: a giving of rest, i.e. perh. holiday-making (cf. [[נוח]]

definitions.title: Hiph. A;
definitions.body: prop. Inf., Sta:§ 621 c Ba:NB 90, cf. Kö:ii. 1, 402);—[[לַמְּדִינוֹת עָשָׂה]] ´[[וַה]] Es 2:18 and a holiday-making for the provinces be enacted, Vulgate requies; but LXX a)/fesiv, whence al. release from taxes, or amnesty.
